document.full_text: restructuring greece's sovereign debt would pose potentially incalculable risks to the overall euro zone and will not solve the country's fiscal crisis, a senior european central bank official said on friday.
document.title: debt restructuring won't help greece: ecb's stark
lines_and_colors: restructuring greece's sovereign debt would pose potentially incalculable risks to the overall euro zone and will not solve the country's fiscal crisis, a senior european central bank official said on friday.
